This form in-network storage in sensor networks is called data centric storage and is achieved by geographic hashing. Geographic hashing refers to hashing of data types to geographic locations. Our contribution from the traffic improvement point of view is 'shifting of storage nodes towards the query regions with new query region and storage node formation algorithms'.
